base_description: Round black pot with blue lid and handles.
part_description: The pot has a round body, two side handles, and a removable blue lid with a central knob. The handles are positioned on opposite sides of the pot.
internal_interaction_description: The lid fits securely on the pot, with the knob allowing easy removal. The handles are attached to the sides, providing stability and ease of handling when the pot is full.
external_interaction_description: The pot can be used on a stove to cook food, with the handles allowing safe transport. The lid helps retain heat and moisture, interacting with the cooking process to ensure even cooking.
